description: sync/atomic: do not run TestStoreLoadSeq for too long (fix windows builder)

messages.text:
*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=d084dfee7dd3 ***

sync/atomic: do not run TestStoreLoadSeq for too long (fix windows builder)

R=golang-dev, adg
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/4962057

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

Luckily, I have very slow computer. This is what it prints after CL is applied:

c:\>8.out.exe -test.v -test.run=TestStoreLoadSeq -test.short
=== RUN  atomic_test.TestStoreLoadSeqCst
--- PASS: atomic_test.TestStoreLoadSeqCst (9.36 seconds)
PASS

c:\>8.out.exe -test.v -test.run=TestStoreLoadSeq
=== RUN  atomic_test.TestStoreLoadSeqCst
--- PASS: atomic_test.TestStoreLoadSeqCst (56.77 seconds)
PASS
